SELECT id, value, label, type, description, sort, parent_id as parentId, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate FROM sys_dict WHERE del_flag = 0
AND type = #{type}
AND description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{description}, '%')
ORDER BY sort

SELECT dict.id as id, dict.value as value, dict.label as label, dict.type as type, dict.description as description, dict.sort as sort FROM sys_dict dict where dict.del_flag=0
AND dict.value LIKE '%${value}%'
AND dict.label LIKE '%${label}%'
AND dict.type LIKE '%${type}%'
AND dict.description LIKE '%${description}%'
ORDER BY sort
